(1촀\0Did you know there's a famous cook
here for Turkey Day?
\0 Just imagine
it—being famous for COOKING!\0\0(촀\0Hmmn\0\0
\0 Does that mean the food he
makes is famous too?
\0 I don't think
I've ever eaten famous food before.

(6촀\0I've spent the whole morning making
up all kinds of amazing Turkey Day
smells to pretend to sniff.\0\0(%촀\0But pretty soon,
\0 I'll get to breathe
ACTUAL smells,
\0 (촀\0and most of the time
those are even better, n\0!

(1촀\0The Turkey Day feast is so close to
starting, I can almost taste it.
\0 And it
tastes almost sooo good!\0\0(촀\0But now I'm worried the food I wanna
make isn't gonna taste the same kind
of almost good, n\0.\0\0(4촀\0Hey,
\0 if you're not too busy chowing
